title: Praise for Dictators and Authoritarians
summary: Trump repeatedly praised, defended, and expressed admiration for the world's most brutal dictators including Putin, Kim Jong Un, Xi Jinping, and others.
keyFacts: Putin: Called him 'genius' and 'savvy' for invading Ukraine; sided with Putin over US intelligence at Helsinki
Kim Jong Un: 'We fell in love' after exchanging letters; called them 'beautiful letters'
Xi Jinping: 'He's now president for life... I think it's great. Maybe we'll have to give that a shot someday'
Erdogan (Turkey): 'He does things the right way' after crackdown on dissent
Duterte (Philippines): Praised his drug war that killed thousands extrajudicially
el-Sisi (Egypt): 'He's a fantastic guy' despite torture and mass detention
Orban (Hungary): 'He's a strong man... a smart man' - EU's most autocratic leader
